titleStmt.title: Oi eleemonez eleethesuntai, or Gods mercy for mans mercy. Opened in a sermon at the spittle, March 31. 1657. before the Right Honourable the Lord Major, the aldermen, &c. By Thomas Jacomb minister of the Gospel at S. Martins Ludgate, London.
titleStmt.author: Jacombe, Thomas, 1622-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Philemon Stephens and are to be sold at the gilded Lion in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first three words of title transliterated from Greek.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
